backend/main.mo: Actor stores contact submissions keyed by caller principal, provides queries for contact status, retrieval, and cafe info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level feature definitions to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and functionality of frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, theming tokens, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with favicon, SEO meta tags, root div, and script bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures hash‑based routing with TanStack Router and registers Home, About, Services, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Form component handling contact submission with validation, backend mutation, and success/error UI states.
frontend/src/components/contact/MapEmbed: Embeds a Google Maps iframe using the configured cafe map URL inside a styled card container.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Button linking to WhatsApp chat using the cafe's configured number with green branded styling.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with headline, subheading, CTAs, and an illustrated image section using gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesPre: Preview grid showing service categories with a short list of items and link to full Services page.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseUs: Displays a grid of service features with icons and descriptions inside a styled section.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders service categories from servicesData, showing category icons, titles, and item lists.
frontend/src/components/site/Container.t: Provides a responsive centered container wrapper for layout spacing.
Footer with cafe info, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
Sticky header with navigation links, logo, WhatsApp button, and mobile menu toggle.
Wraps the site with header, footer, and an outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/config/cafeInfo.ts: Exports static cafe information including contact details and map embed URL.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines social media and WhatsApp link URLs.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Provides service categories and items used for the services grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching cafe info, contacts, and submitting contact forms via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables and theme styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, descriptive sections about the cafe, mission/vision blocks, and reasons to choose the service.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, business hours, a contact form area, WhatsApp button, and SEO metadata for the Contact page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the Home page with hero, services preview, why-choose-us sections, SEO setup, and a CTA area with WhatsApp and contact links.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with SEO metadata, a service category grid, and a custom services CTA block.
frontend/src/seo/Seo.tsx: A React component that sets page titles, meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and injects LocalBusiness JSON-LD.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, design goals, image assets, and existing implemented features for the site build.
